zone.line: of our own times: and if indeed the
melody of their compositions were more
tender & delicate & inspiring than
the melodies of some modern European
nations thier superiority in this art
must have been something wonderful
& wholly beyond conception. Of Thier
a very high, tho not so disproportionate
poetry if I make two exceptions -portionate
seems to maintain the same
rank in the comparison Shakespeare
superiority: for though from the variety
& comprehension of his genius seems,
is
indivi considered as an whole, to be exempted
-pted from a comparison with all other men,
perhaps
& though Dante has created imaginations
which in themselves have greater gr loveliness
to be
& energy than any to be found in the

line.del: literature of Greece, & though the tenderness

zone.line: & sublime sensibility of Petrarch finds no
rival in the fragments yet considered
as a mere poet Homer must be
to excel Shakspeare
acknowledged in the truth & harmony
